The Swedish company has said little about how it came to that number, making it hard to evaluate the offer. Saab spokesperson Jenny

articles.title: How full-time return-to-office might further strain Ottawa's child-care system
articles.description: Advocates say Ottawa's current system could not meet the additional demand from parents returning to their offices five days a week.

articles.title: Quebec unemployment falls to 5.1% as job growth surges ahead of key Bank of Canada decision
articles.description: OTTAWA — Statistics Canada is set to release fresh employment figures for November this morning. A Reuters poll of economists expects the unemployment rate ticked up to seven per cent last month with a forecast loss of 5,000 jobs. Royal Bank is calling for the unemployment rate to hold steady at 6.9

articles.title: Canada added 54,000 jobs in November, unemployment rate drops to 6.5%: StatCan
articles.description: OTTAWA — The labour market surprised economists again in November with a third straight month of job gains. Statistics Canada said Friday that the economy added 54,000 new positions last month compared with economists’ expectations for a small loss. The unemployment rate fell to 6.5 per cent in Nove

articles.title: 60,000 African penguins starved to death after sardine numbers collapsed – study
articles.description: Climate crisis and overfishing contributed to loss of 95% of penguins in two breeding colonies in South Africa, research findsMore than 60,000 penguins in colonies off the coast of South Africa have starved to death as a result of disappearing sardines, a new paper has found.More than 95% of the Afr
